TopicTitle: Strange white cylinder lagging my game

Articles.Content:
I just got back into KSP not even a week ago and reinstalled all of the mods I had a while back, everything worked fine, but as soon as I started creating a new ship I noticed something strange at the bottom of my VAB and SPH. Some strange white cylinder spawns at the very bottom, and when I launch a ship, it appears to stick to the cockpit for some reason, almost like it's connected to the kerbal inside (somehow?). This weird entity seems to also lag the crap out of my game too, because when I did some test flights with some planes the entity actually slid off the ship and my frames came back to a smooth 60, but soon after the thing re spawned and dropped my frames once again. Any ideas on what mod is causing this?
